alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:59AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Benton, northwestern Washington and northeastern Adair Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 959 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Highfill, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Rogers... Bentonville... Siloam Springs... Bella Vista... Pea Ridge... Gentry... Tontitown... Cave Springs... Westville... Highfill... Springtown... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Cincinnati... Hiwasse... Miller... Centerton... Elm Springs... Savoy... Wedington... Gallitin... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 84 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
